sg.yeefan.searchenginewrapper
Class ResultsXMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  sg.yeefan.searchenginewrapper.ResultsXMLWriter

public class ResultsXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Writer for writing search engine results to a XML file. The output XML file contains a root element <resultslist>, whose children are zero or more <results> elements, each representing a set of search engine results. It is mandatory to call the close() method after all the search engine results have been written.

This writer must produce XML files that are well-formed, such that a non-validating XML parser is able to parse the XML files. The XML files produced by this writer must be readable by both the ResultsXMLReader class as well as the legacy SearchEngineResultsXML class.

Implementatation notes: This implementation uses Streaming API for XML (StAX) to output the XML file. The line breaks between XML elements are important for backwards compatability.

Author:
Tan Yee Fan
